feed.title: MSFS Blog
feed.subtitle: Development updates of Microsoft Flight Simulator.

entry.title: In Memory of Anton Logvynenko: Digital Artist & Aviation Enthusiast
entry.summary: The team at Microsoft Flight Simulator would like to take a moment to pay our condolences and provide tribute to a beloved member of the flight sim community â€“ Anton Logvynenko, who passed away while carrying out a combat mission in the Kharkiv region on November 27, 2023.

entry.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024: Preview Round Up
entry.summary: Earlier in September a collection of community content creators and press representatives were given a hands-on early preview of Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024. Stay tuned to this page where weâ€™ll be highlighting some of their impressions and thoughts.

entry.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 FAQ

entry.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024: Release Date Announcement
entry.summary: Take to the Skies on November 19th with the All-New Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024.

entry.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024: The Many Enhancements That Make This the Most Ambitious Flight Sim Ever
entry.summary: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 takes the franchise further than ever before with groundbreaking new elements like worldwide Aviation Careers, a white-knuckle Challenge League system, and a brand-new World Photographer mode. Learn more and pre-order now!

entry.title: Aircraft & Avionics Update 3 Now Available
entry.summary: Aircraft and Avionics Update 3 is now available as a free download for allÂ Microsoft Flight Simulator (2020) players! This update enhances three aircraft, the Airbus A320neo V2, Airbus A310-33, and Pilatus PC-6 Porter.If you are playing on PC, outdated packages in your community folder may have an unexpected impact on the titleâ€™s performance and behavior. â€¦ Continued

entry.title: October 3rd, 2024 â€“ Development Update
entry.summary: Earlier this week, we launched Aircraft & Avionics Update 3 (AAU3)! This release enhances three aircraft: the Airbus A310-300, Airbus A320neo V2, and Pilatus PC-6 Porter.

entry.title: Expert Series 01: ATR 42-600 / 72-600 Expansion
entry.summary: Since its release in April 2023, Expert Series 01: ATR 42-600 / 72-600 has become one of the most popular aircraft in the virtual skies ofÂ Microsoft Flight Simulator. Today we are pleased to update this versatile regional turboprop with many bug fixes and other improvements based on feedback from the community. Additionally, this expansion also â€¦ Continued
